A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney once again showed their inability to portray men as anything other than stupid buffoons. Fin is called a coward. Poe is made to be a short-sighted jock who can't understand more complex plans. Luke Skywalker becomes jaded and loses the kindness that is central to his character in three films. The Lucas Films intentionally portrayed strong male and female characters alongside each other in friendship.
